alert.note: Alert for Bent; Prowers (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 4:01PM MDT until June 06 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Prowers County in southeastern Colorado... Northeastern Bent County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 515 PM MDT. * At 401 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles south of Hasty to 10 miles northeast of Two Buttes, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lamar, Holly, Granada, Wiley, Hartman, McClave, Bristol, John Martin Reservoir and Caddoa. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
